lender.name: Clay
lender.loan_because:
My grandmother sent me $10 for me to give to someone who could use it. $10 doesn't go that far, so I made it more, but I figure Kiva gets loans to people who generally have a solid plan for making their life better.
I don't know who else I could help who would deserve it more, or use the money more wisely.

lender.name: Carly
lender.loan_because: 1. It gives others a chance to improve their lives for themselves. That's such an empowering, wonderful and important thing. 2. If I didn't do things like this to help others, I'd probably get too stuck up in helping myself, and I know that doesn't bring real happiness.

lender.occupational_info: As a small Catholic School, we teach about our Faith to grow up to be and to raise moral and righteous people. We do our best to live lives as we are taught to live.

lender.loan_because: The loan is for labor and some equipment.
lender.occupational_info: Shirley, lives in Sao Paulo - Brazil, has 52 years, two married daughters and a grandson, is setting up a restaurant, the experience we have is 10 years working as an employee and also making food, cakes, sweets and pastries in your home. Shirley has 70% of the equipment required for assembly of the restaurant, 100% of the material for the reform and the property is already rented. Next week begins the reform of the property. Shirley made training courses on prepared dishes, food handling, fire brigade, hygiene at work, eight cooking courses, administration, computing and entrepreneurship for small business.

You know how architects create blue prints to build the infrastructure of a building or a home? My job is similar to that - I build blue print for computer systems... ( i know, it sounds geeky, but I love it).

lender.name: Elect Prophetess
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do!
lender.occupational_info:
We appreciate you taking the time out to read this very important message about our movement. We are The Ministers Of Visual Expression, as know as The M.O.V.E. We are a worldwide traveling ministry that aim to make a greater impact in people's lives through visual demonstration, and informative cognition. We strive to create inspirational, and motivational tactics that we can strategically use to change people's attitudes and bring forth harmonious environments by teaching the word of God.
We are a non-denominational organization that accepts all people, and understand that we all have an individuality presence in the world. We have not set out to make people like us, but to empower them to bring out the champion in themselves. Encouragement boosts one's self esteem, and self-esteem increase's positive thinking, and positive thinking promotes healthy lifestyles. Living healthy lifestyles is our ultimate goal!
We need all the help and financial support that anyone can offer us. The Ministers Of Visual Expression would like to take this opportunity to thank you in advance for all your love and support. We ourselves, can use some encouraging words. Please help support our ministry. If you are interested in becoming apart of our ministry, please visit our website: http://www.the-move.co.cc
God Bless -Amen
